item.title: Starting with an item?
item.dc:creator: @goodboi1112 goodboi1112
item.description:
@goodboi1112 wrote:

ok the player equipment hat is were u put the code and they will wear it
also you can find this is the player.java

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1021; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1725; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1171; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

item.title: Starting with an item?
item.dc:creator: @Lucas_Shocked Lucas[Shocked]
item.description:
@Lucas_Shocked wrote:

Whenever I try to make a sleeping cap [14819] be in a new player’s inventory, instead of only 1 sleeping cap being in there, every single slot is filled with them.
I used:

for (int i = 1; i < playerItems.length; i++) { // Setting player items playerItems[i] = 14820; } for (int i = 27; i < playerItemsN.length; i++) { // Setting Item amounts playerItemsN[i] = 27; }

I put 14820 because it spawns one ID down
Can someone post what it SHOULD look like?

Read full topic
